problem:
A theater plans to perform 7 repertoires in the 7 weeks of the fall, they are F, G., J, K, O, R, S.One repertoire is performed every week, and each repertoire is exactly one week.The repertoire must meet the following conditions? (1) G must be performed in the third week.(2) O and S cannot perform continuously.(3) K must be arranged before J and S.(4) F and J must be arranged to perform in two consecutive weeks.Q: If S is scheduled for the sixth week, then which week must R be scheduled? Answer Choices: (A)the second week (B)Fourth week (C)fifth week (D)Seventh week
A: Among A through D, the answer is
